description: A species within the Star Wars universe
title: People

___language.description: The language commonly spoken by this species.

___average_height.description: The average height of this person in centimeters.

___people.description: An array of People URL Resources that are a part of this species.

___homeworld.description: The URL of a planet resource, a planet that this species originates from.

___created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

___hair_colors.description: A comma-seperated string of common hair colors for this species, none if this species does not typically have hair.

___url.description: The hypermedia URL of this resource.

___edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.

___skin_colors.description: A comma-seperated string of common skin colors for this species, none if this species does not typically have skin.

___films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this species has appeared in.

___average_lifespan.description: The average lifespan of this species in years.

___eye_colors.description: A comma-seperated string of common eye colors for this species, none if this species does not typically have eyes.
